Title: PharmIQ Core Platform
Description: Foundational IP platform for ingesting Rx events, building snapshots, and providing deterministic, auditable pipelines that augment CenterSync.

Title: Explainable Refill & Bundle Risk Scoring
Description: Explainable risk scoring for refill abandonment, shipment split, and bundle break risks.

Title: Bundle-Aware Recommendations & Action Tracking
Description: Bundle-aware intervention recommendations with action and outcome tracking.

Title: Executive Savings & Ops Risk Dashboard
Description: Executive and ops dashboards focused on shipment reduction, outreach savings, and risk visibility.

Title: Bundle & Outreach Risk Simulation
Description: Synthetic member/refill journeys to simulate bundle fragmentation and outreach cost leakage.

Title: Security, Compliance & Trust
Description: Compliance guardrails, pseudonymization, and full auditability for regulated healthcare AI.

Title: Define canonical refill & bundle event schema
Description: Canonical event schema covering refill, PA, OOS, and bundle-relevant lifecycle events.

Title: Build refill event ingestion API
Description: Batch ingestion endpoint with validation and immutable audit logging.

Title: Implement status→bundle-event mapping
Description: Deterministic mapping from source system statuses to bundle-aware canonical events.

Title: Build refill snapshot aggregation
Description: Aggregate events into snapshot capturing stage, PA state, and bundle timing.

Title: Compute bundle-relevant snapshot metrics
Description: Age-in-stage, refill timing overlap, refill gap, and bundle alignment indicators.

Title: Detect bundle break & abandonment risk
Description: Explainable scoring to detect likely bundle fragmentation and refill abandonment.

Title: Detect shipment split & fulfillment delay risk
Description: Explainable scoring to detect shipment splits caused by PA, OOS, or timing delays.

Title: Build explainability layer for bundle risks
Description: Top drivers with evidence explaining why a bundle or shipment is at risk.

Title: Version risk and explainability logic
Description: Persist model and explainability versions for audit and traceability.

Title: Build bundle-aware recommendation engine
Description: Recommend delay/advance/suppress actions to preserve bundles and reduce outreach.

Title: Enforce human-in-loop guardrails
Description: Ensure recommendations require human approval before execution.

Title: Track bundle-preserving actions
Description: Capture actions taken to prevent shipment splits or redundant outreach.

Title: Measure bundle & outreach outcomes
Description: Track shipment reduction and outreach suppression outcomes.

Title: Build ops work queue for bundle risks
Description: Ops queue listing members/refills at risk of bundle break or shipment split.

Title: Build bundle risk case drill-down
Description: Timeline, drivers, bundle context, and recommended actions.

Title: Build executive savings dashboard
Description: Shipment reduction, outreach savings, and $ impact metrics.

Title: Generate synthetic bundle scenarios
Description: Simulate clean bundles, PA-delayed splits, OOS-driven splits.

Title: Parameterize timing & inventory distributions
Description: Configurable PA, OOS, and refill timing distributions.

Title: Replay bundle risk simulations
Description: Deterministic reset and replay of synthetic scenarios.

Title: Enforce pseudonymization & ID hygiene
Description: Reject non-pseudonymous identifiers across all inputs.
